Experience from School

My experience from school projects

Play With Meow

This is simple tamagotchi/Pou style game where user take care of cat namen Meow. I dreated tis raw game as course project for course Software Development Skills: Mobile 2021-22. I got Inspiration of caracter from my owen cat Hestia

Treasure Hunter

Simple java-script based game, I created as a course project for Introduction to the Web Applications 2022 -course. Main idea of game is to collect all stars, survive all three levels and find treasure.
